name: هروب من المنزل
description:
Yazan Alaauddin Hussain

In this game you are a volunteer in a program to save the people of Riyadh.  You will go to the citizen's houses and get them out and kill all the viruses. the mission is too dangerous for you to go, so you will be driving a drone to preform the tasks. you need to kill the viruses before they infected the citizens. the houses are like mazes so you need to find a way through and be quick before the viruses reach the people before you. Good luck! You are our last hope!

GameMaker Studio 2
